title: Mini rework eco

embed.description: League of Legends' next big content patch is 8.10, introducing a suite of changes to marksmen and their core items, as well as a new Pulsefire skin trio. Have a look below for all the information we've got, straight from the PBE. Want in? You'll need the best League of Legends champions.

body:
Enchantment: Runic Echoes - changed

+60 AP
+ 10% CDR
+ 300 mana
New effect: Unique passive - Echo
Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next damaging spell hit expends all charges to deal 60 (+10% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit. 
This effect deals 250% damage to Large Monsters. Hitting a Large Monster with this effect will restore 25% of your missing Mana. 

Finalmente allineano i due oggetti (probabilmente si farà anche in altro modo)
Questo potrebbe dare un respiro di viabilità a diana jung e aiutare un po gli apc jung che eve apparte non sono in formissima

P.s.c'e anche un nerf agli item iniziali della jung :O
